name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior AWS Engineer with 8 years of experience, I demonstrate expertise in **AWS** and related technologies including **ECS**, **EKS**, **Serverless**, and **Terraform**, ensuring robust cloud solutions aligned with AWS Well-Architected standards. My comprehensive knowledge extends to cloud governance, security, compliance, and FinOps, ensuring all applications conform to industry regulations. With hands-on experience in data architecture and analytics, I am skilled in designing **Data Lake** solutions tailored for performance and scalability. 
In addition, I possess a deep understanding of networking and IAM, which helps in constructing resilient cloud infrastructures. My technical background includes full-stack development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, and **Node.js**. I’ve successfully led the development of high-performance platforms in the healthcare and financial sectors, integrating advanced technologies for AI/ML, predictive analytics, and real-time data processing, adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My collaborative approach and strong communication skills foster teamwork and enhance customer orientation, aligning project outcomes with organizational goals.
